description:
A prestigious Los Angeles law firm is seeking a 100% remote-working Commercial Litigator to join their elite team of Commercial Litigators. This role offers the perfect blend of high-stakes legal work, big-name clients, and a flexible fully-remote working life. If you're tired of working in a bigger law firm, and prefer to be recognized and rewarded, with all the benefits of working from home, then apply today

Key Responsibilities:

  • Spearhead litigation strategies in state, federal, and appellate courts
  • Navigate complex discovery processes and depositions
  • Craft compelling motions and prepare watertight cases for trial
  • Focus on consumer, commercial, and employment litigation

Qualifications:

  • California Bar License (non-negotiable)
  • 3+ years of battle-tested litigation experience
  • Federal court experience is a plus, but not required

What We Offer:

  • 100% remote work environment
  • Competitive salary: $135,000 - $170,000 per year
  • Comprehensive benefits package including 401(k) with matching, health, dental, and vision insurance
  • Generous PTO to recharge your legal superpowers

The Ideal Candidate:

  • You're a legal virtuoso who thrives in the digital courtroom. You're passionate about justice, tech-savvy, and ready to push the boundaries of remote legal practice. If you're excited about winning cases from your home office and being part of a cutting-edge legal team, we want to hear from you! Ready to Don Your Virtual Cape?

Apply now to join our team of remote legal crusaders. Let's redefine the future of litigation together!

Mission Recruiting is proud to represent some of the most prestigious organizations in the country. Contact us today to learn how we can help you explore this and other exciting opportunities.

Salary Range: $135,000 - $170,000
